response.overview: Like some other kids, 12-year-old Trevor McKinney believed in the goodness of human nature. Like many other kids, he was determined to change the world for the better. Unlike most other kids, he succeeded.
response.tagline: When someone does you a big favor, don't pay it back... Pay It Forward
response.title: Pay It Forward

titles.title: ペイ・フォワード 可能の王国
